title: 系统对游戏性能有影响么
author: nhqs83
txt_content: 就比如XP或者W7 对MC有影响么 影响大么

replies.author: 阿柒丶
replies.txt_content: 看你电脑配置  配置好怎么都没事

replies.author: zyjking
replies.txt_content: win7或win10没多大区别，XP就别用了

replies.author: yanyu123
replies.txt_content: 一个几乎开不起来 一个能开 影响肯定大..

replies.author: fitexmage
replies.txt_content: XP有的时候内存不够，会直接强制关闭MC

replies.author: 小cheng
replies.txt_content: 配置高用w10，底下的用w7或者xp
